entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 5:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
